title: The Rising Son: An Epic Fantasy Adventure
description: A fading Emperor, his failing Dragon, and rivals bent on stealing his Throne.In a land rich with culture and mystical wonders, a fragile decade-long peace is threatened as ancient families scheme to seize the Jade Throne.But peace isn’t the only thing at stake.The gods’ gift of magic connects the heavens to the isles by the thinnest of threads. When the Son of Heaven falls, this tether to magic frays, thrusting the world into chaos.The Rising Son is the exciting first adventure in The Isles of Jade and Fire series. Bestselling author J.D. Ruffin weaves together a tale of warring families, forbidden loves, bitter rivalries, and a desperate quest to save the world when all seems lost.If you like Game of Thrones or House of the Dragon, you’ll love The Rising Son!
author: J.D. Ruffin
